resources.string: 1. Start Position. Place both hands on the yoga mat shoulder-with apart and both feet together behind you.
2. Inhale. While maintaining a neutral spine, behind your elbows and lower your torso to the mat.
3. Exhale. Push through your chest andextend your elbows to lift your body back into the starting position.
This sample needs permission for camera and audio recording.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
